entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -33.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: NW 37 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:47 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:47 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 47 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:47 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
